name: Masoud Seddighin
content: Masoud Seddighin [email protected] Peronal Website >> Assistant Professor Bio Masoud Seddighin received his Ph.D. from Sharif University in 2019. He was a postdoc at Institute for Research in Fundamental Sciences (IPM). His Research Interests include Algorithms and Complexity, Algorithmic Game Theory, and Computational Social Science. Download CV Research Interests Algorithms Algorithmic Game Theory Computational Social Science Education Research Teaching Ph.D. from Sharif University in 2019 Publications: Masoud Seddighin, Saeed Seddighin, "Improved Maximin Guarantees for Subadditive and Fractionally Subadditive Fair Allocation Problem.
